body:
Well I made this post so people can comment what they thought was the best April fools thing or did or just what you did for Aprils the first ! You could include picture appropriate please !

I'll start us off...

Best April fools thing you saw/did : Well I was live streaming and a Map Dev started watching my stream so he decided to rename a map 'ElementProHD's bedroom' !



Thanks Element livestreamer (Twitch willbob101)

replies.body: They said the flight to London was cancelled due to a giant hurricane above Germany, the funny thing is that it wasn't a fool and I was actually stuck f**king 20 hours at the Amsterdam Airport. :D

replies.body:
put petroleum jelly on all the doorknobs in my house, which backfired beacuse i couldnt get out of my room.

i also threw out all the soap bars. then i changed all the soap in the dispensers in bathrooms to water so everyone would be dirty, which also backfired because my hands were also dirty....
